name: Surprise Present Escape
description:
In this game, you play as a suprise present which has come to life. Finding yourself in a odd house, your goal is to escape the house so you can return to your friends.

This was the idea a couple a friends and I came up with for the Yogscast 48 hour game jam for December 2020. Yet again this year, I worked on the project alone. The gameplay might be a little lacking, there aren't any sound effects or real animations, but I think I achieved a lot more this year than the previous year.  Hope you enjoy!

(I also couldn't really come up with a good name, sorry about that).

[Made with Unity]
